ygData.subject: RE: Lavastorm bug
ygData.msgSnippet: I have found Lavastorm to be very buggy when zoning in and out of it.  I have zoned out of Najena into a pool of lava.  The guide didn t bat an eye about
ygData.messageBody:
I have found Lavastorm to be very buggy when zoning in and out of it. I
have zoned out of Najena into a pool of lava. The guide didn't bat an eye
about rezzing me so I figured it must happen quite often. I also had an odd
occurance happen last night. I was zoning from Nektulos and had a couple
guards on me. and while zoning was disconnected several times. When I
finally got back in I was in the NE corner of the zone rather than by the
zone line. I have only had this happen when zoning from Oasis and dropping
in near the grassy section of N Ro.

Rylos Darmadrigal Bard of the 21st (almost 22nd) chorus on E'ci
